content: Amazon consistently don't show all of my searching options, brands, models, and like items, until after I've settled on a 2nd best product. Frustrating shopping for products, when Amazon suppresses brands and models that Amazon don't favor. Please stop that suppression madness, and give me everything that I am looking for on the first try! I'm tired of having to Return items, because what I am really looking for Consistently shows up, immediately After I have made a 2nd best purchase!

This app was working just fine until the last update. The home screen never has loaded right for me. Last night it started crashing every time I would try to open it and it would cause other apps to start crashing too, like my email and virus protection. I decided to uninstall and reinstall. It at least opened so I could do what I wanted to do last night, but this morning it started all over again so I uninstalled again. Now I can't get it to reinstall. I use this app ALL THE TIME! FIX IT!

Just recently the app started freezing. I thought it was my phone so I shut my phone off. Turned it back on, clicked on the Amazon app, and several times I got a message saying apps is not working, close the app, or want to send feedback. Twice I uninstall. I then realized the unsupected updates that took place has somehow messed up the ability for the app to open. Once the app is uninstalled and you open it, access to the app is fine. What type of updates warranted the app to malfuction?ü§î

This new app format/structure is UGLY. Huge, bubbly shaped interface. The icons/tap options eat TOO much space, taking up 1/10 the screen sometimes. I miss the old format. I'm sure they are trying to streamline the navigations but yikes! This is WAY too simplistic and its even uninteresting to use. Like going from using from M.S. Word to M.S. Notepad. PLEASE put it back to how it used to be: the navigation bar on the top left with options v.s. the options at the bottom with bubble shape options.

I love Amazon. They provide excellent customer service and I rarely have problems. Real issue is external vendors because that's where I have issues 100% of the time especially with stuff coming from far away so I have to make sure I am always buying stuff fulfilled by Amazon. Hate the new app icon btw. Looks super ugly so I had to remove it from my home screen.

Free Shipping Glitch. Every time I go to check out and click the Free Shipping option (not through Amazon prime) the whole thing greys out and it won't load anything or let me check out. It basically freezes. On a computer it's fine. On my phone, every time. It's becoming annoying. I'm not going to pay an extra ten dollars for shipping if I don't have to but having to open up my lap top rather than clicking a button on the app just to do that is first world problems to the max.

I love amazon and have been using it for years. However the new site navigation is horrible. You can't just go and scroll through all the products anymore, you have to go by page which gets annoying. The filters are way harder to navigate and irritating, if you want to switch categories it will clear all of your other filters (size, color ect.) Which you then have to find again. Really wish Amazon would go back to its previous format.

Honestly, Amazon has become disappointing. Speaking to the quality of the company, I've had more and more concerns with their business practices in recent years. As far as the app experience goes, I've been finding it difficult to use. The app is basically a web wrapper for the most part. It's not well integrated with newer features of Android, and it can be incredibly slow at times. I would have expected better from such a large, high value company.

This app is a chore to use. It's tedious to find anything unless you specifically search for it. It forces unrelated sponsored products in the results further adding to the frustration. It also keeps recommending I sign up for prime even though I already have it... Simple tasks drag out due to a confusing unintuitive interface. I'm really surprised at how bad it is.

I have been using the Amazon app for what seems like "forever" and I have never had a complaint. The app has always been easy to use. However, the most recent update that occured in early March 2021, is horrible. They have not only moved the toolbar to the bottom, but also increased the text size so large that it essentially minimizes useful key features within that toolbar. This makes the time to look for specific categories and features much longer. Stop 'fixing' unbroken things.

Most of the time recently, when I go to change the shipping speed to the Free Delivery option (which is never the default), the app locks up (looks like it's loading but never actually does anything). I have to go onto the desktop computer in order to complete my order with Free Shipping. This makes the app fairly pointless. I see this has been mentioned in several other reviews but has not yet been fixed.

Amazon is my go to on line shopping app. I never have any issues with it. But after this last update, it's been super glitchy. The pictures dont open up right away, the ratings disappear and then come back, while looking at color options they also disappear then I have to wait for it to pop up again. Man, this is annoying and frustrating. Please fix it! I love Amazon but I wont give it the 5 star rating until it's fixed.

The app itself is fine. Easy to navigate and place orders. It does not however help you to contact Amazon in regards to their delivery drivers, it gives you a short list of what to choose from. Now, during Winter it was frustrating, but understandable when they left packages out by the mailboxes on the roads, safety and all that. However, there is no snow on the ground now and packages are still being left by mailboxes at the road. This just screams "steal me" making it easier for porch pirates

The app is functionally fine. I've been using it for more than a decade and the recent change that has moved to navigation to the bottom of the screen is just so awkward to me. The previous, upper left hand menu access was not only familiar because of the apps implementation but also because that's where the vast majority of mobile web sites place the expandable menu.

This new look to the app is not an improvement. The bottom orientation is unintuitive to the previous left hand side version. And the icon is so boring and ugly I've removed it from my homepage and thereby decreased the usage. I'll check back in after you've played with it all over again like we all know that you will in another few months. Sad design failure.

The update looks like Amazon went backwards 10 yrs. It looks old, outdated, chunky. The last one is soooo much nicer. Easy flowing and smooth sailing. When I am looking at the updated format, i feel as if i am being blocked and want to just navagate right out of there and buy nothing. The previous format just makes me want to spend money. Change it back, please!

I've been using this app for a really long time. Suddenly its broken. Crashes before it opens. I've cleared the cache, cleared the data. Completely relogged in. It worked once after that. Now crashing repeatedly. I cant even give feedback because that part crashes too. When it works, I love it. But right now, I got nothing. Cant even file a report.

Since the new march 2021 update the app is super slow and doesn't load things properly, it can take over 10 mins to load some item pages at times, and that's with good internet. They've also moved the bar to the bottom of the screen which is in an awkward place, especially as keeping track of items in your basket is easier when in the top corner, not under your fingers/thumbs when trying to scroll.

App crashes. This app upsets me, because it now uses bait and switch. I can't believe amazon has resorted to this. It places buttons required to be pushed in clear view, but now resorts to pushing the button down and replacing it with an advertisement just as you select it. It has also decreased the number of items it will show in a search just so they can advertise more. For one of the largest companies in the world, it has resorted to playing games with your time.

Worked perfectly before update. After update... Pop-up shows activity. Go to pop-up and the program opens but never reveals activity. Just continually tries to load screen. If you go to the app manually, only parts of what you select will load, otherwise just continually trying to load page. Pretty much worthless. Roll it back or please fix the issues. After a bit of pages trying to load we get the dog page saying uh-oh, something went wrong on our end. Thank you.

Although we utilized the prime membership heavily during the pandemic, I have to admit that we used it quite a bit before and most likely will afterward. Prices can be a bit higher than other places but the "free" shipping that costs $99/year more than makes up for it. I've started adding things to my cart that are only wanted, not needed or a necessity and save for later as you'll get a notification in those items when the price goes up or down. Also, keep a look out on items that have coupons!

Would really like there to be a receipt for orders. I'm old and actually balance my checkbook, so unless I remember to grab a screenshot of my order page, I have no idea how much I just spent. It's also very difficult to even find what it was I ordered, especially if I ordered more than one of an item. Better search results would also be great. Show me what I asked for first, and then other similar items, not a randomly jumbled up mix of what I asked for and a bunch of other stuff!

This app was previously functional on all of my Android devices. One of the updates is rendered this app completely unusable on every device I have. The app claims there's no internet connection when I've tried on multiple different methods. There are no useful support threads and Amazon just says to reinstall the app from the play store. An unfortunate experience when the website runs perfectly fine in mobile on all of the same devices.

I mean, it's the Amazon app. If you Amazon, you will almost certainly App this. I have an issue where any link to an Amazon product page "opens" the app, but all I get is a small header bar saying "Amazon [something]" in black text on a thin white bar across the top of the app screen space, and it hangs. I have to force-close this app, then launch it and wait for it to connect and stabilize, then go back to the offending link which now works.

Great service! And the tablet I ordered was delivered swiftly, and a day before it was supposed to come in. However, even after an update, the menus and UI on Oreo (8.1) devices such as the LG Stylo 4 are very buggy, sometimes doing rapid flashes. And that might be an issue for many people using Amazon on mobile phones. Please find a way to get this fixed so that the app can actually be used properly.

Amazon is pretty much my go-to for my shopping, there's never much issues with returning or applying for refunds or settling issues between seller and buyer. Prices are competitive, it's just all around convenient. 99% of the time stuff arrives on time and in excellent condition. I love the subscribe and save, you can have regular items delivered without having to shop for them every month or so. I'm a prime customer too so that also includes other perks. I find it worth it for our needs.

The recent update is terrible. The app has never been fast (even with my fast internet) but its gotten slower. It takes a long time for the search results to load etc. Also, whenever I go to check out it freezes up and won't respond even if I let it sit for a while. Free shipping is not set to default and It won't let me select free shipping (who pays for shipping anymore anyway?) Also, it won't complete transactions. Step it up Amazon, it's not like you can't afford an app that actually works.

I'm a prime member and use Amazon almost daily for both personal and business and wouldn't be without it. I held off for many many years as I didn't find them competitive, that's all changed over the last 12 months or so. Anyone thinking of taking the plunge (especially for a Prime Membership) I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Amazon. their returns, speed of delivery and ease of use are unparalleled. Well done Amazonüëç

Completely pointless. Every time you go to check out and want to change delivery preferendes you're just left on a loading screen. And I've left it in case it is really loading something and needs to take time, but no a full hour can go by and nothing happens. So I can't use the app to buy stuff, I have to go onto the website instead. Completely defeats the point of having the app.

Very easy to navigate, very smooth interface. I love Amazon! You find everything you're looking for and more. I am an Amazon Prime member so the 2 Day delivery is awesome, never really have a problem with them. The couples times I did have a problem was a package not showing up, and I was either refunded or sent another product, absolutely love the app, so much easier than logging onto the website all the time.

I'm on a Galaxy S7 and the app is terrible. it's incredibly slow and often unresponsive to touch, especially when adding items to a list. I often find myself tapping the screen 20 times just to get something to happen. It's very frustrating, and from what I've read, it seems to be a popular issue. I'm not sure why one of the richest corporations in the world can't fix such simple problems with their major application. Update: Still experiencing these issues on a brand new 5G Motorola.

Amazon starting their service here in the UAE was a godsend. It revitalised online shopping, for me at least. It's a good service, or it feels that way because all others are bad. Thankfully, haven't had a bad experience yet, but I imagine it's a matter of time. Wish their delivery system was a bit more flexible, and allows us to choose the time to receive it. Minus one star.

Works like a charm! The app is preferable to my computer, due to the fact I can take my time to compare products in my freetime. I feel it helps me to make more informed decisions on my purchances this way. The only thing I would improve so far is the lists option, which when first selected, will go to a blank page. Then one has to click to see the lists. Which does not make sense. But over all, is a very, very good app!

it's great that I can find almost anything on Amazon but delivery times have gotten slower and slower in the last few months. Paying for Prime 2-day delivery does not seem to matter any more because some prime items can still take a week or more to arrive. Using USPS was the worst idea Amazon ever came up with. Item selection, on the other hand, is great. it's great being able to find so many things in one place.

I do a lot of shopping on amazon, but I am having issues with the app since the recent update. It keeps trying to load, and the screen freezes when I try to scroll down. The next and previous buttons also disappear at times so I can't continue to shop for more products. I have a samsung galaxy s7, so it isn't an issue with my phone. Please work out these bugs. It's making it very hard for me to shop.

Amazon has always been my go-to. I give 4 stars for 1 reason that frustrates me. When I buy an item, Amazon doesn't actually pull out the $$ for the item until it's ready to ship, but for someone like me who is frugal & living paycheck to paycheck this is very inconvenient. When I buy the item, that's when I have the $$, by waiting a few days before taking it out I spend it on a different item & 4get what I bought online even though I need both, Amazon notifies me the item I ordered can't b ship

Amazon is great. Everything i have ever ordered has come in a timely fashion. If I have any problems it has always been simple and hassle-free to return and get a refund or have a damaged product replaced. My only complain is that some of the products from different retailers are starting to be more cheaply made. I don't want Amazon turning into an app like Wish. I've always loved Amazon for there deals and quality standards. And the standards they expect from retailers.

This app takes items and hikes up the price.... The app is perfect for product searching so you can then go to the actual seller's website and find it cheaper though. Bezos is already rich so you may as well just use the app to look up what you want and then skip the middle man's cut in the price by going directly to the seller. You can thank me later.

I am hating this company more and more. mainly because of their web and app developers. They make it impossible for customers to use. I don't have a tablet and don't want to be on my phone all day. I prefer to use websites on my computer. I recently updated my laptop and need to reinstall all the accessory apps. there no longer is an Amazon app to be found for lap tops and computers. I am not talking about Prime streaming or Kindal, I am referring to just buying something online. I know it's petty, but why make it harder for customers to spend their money. Make a damn shopping app that doesn't require a mobile service. You know, like you used to!

Is there anything else to say about Amazon except, how convenient it is to quickly buy stuff and have it delivered incredibly fast?! I think Amazon's customer service speaks for itself. They are really great! As well as the standard they hold their sellers to. I appreciate the convienece of their well run system. I really appreciate the details/pictures they give you about each product and how quickly you can buy the items you want.

Update: how have you still not fixed the bug where THE APP DOESN'T OPEN WHEN CLICKING A LINK IN CHROME?! How is that not on the very top of your list to fix? Breaks every time I click an Amazon link on Google. Shoes an Amazon Shopping bar across the top of my screen, but the rest of the screen doesn't load and won't allow me to click anywhere until I close the program. It's been this way for months, maybe a year. Bout time it gets solved.

I like the app - I don't like the app forcing my links to open in it. Even after fixing it in my settings to ask...it doesn't. It auto redirects to the app so because of that I needed to uninstall it. It's the only way I don't get forced into the app when clicking a link and sometimes you just need the website. You can pinch and zoom and other things on the app.

The app itself works great. Its just a little slow and a pain when it comes to "cancelling" multiple orders especially orders that have not shipped yet or are 'discounted/promotional' offer. Good luck because not even customer service can help ya with that one. I was told to "remove my payment method" because they could not cancel my orders even though they didn't even ship yet.

Amazon with Amazon prime is just awesome, but without prime... It's really annoying when you forget to put something in the cart because then you have to pay for shipping or add a bunch of stuff to the cart for the minimum $35 or something like that. Anyways Amazon has fast enough shipping and the staff have usually solved any kind of problem online within that 3-day deadline sort of thing. Returns are simple enough. The app is helpful just not as precise as the website itself.

Keeps Crashing OnePlus 7 Pro, forcing me to restart my phone. In those instances, the order tracking screen overlays itself permanently over the home screen of the phone. Even force closing the app does not get rid of it. This means the only user interaction possible still is via the hardware buttons and the notification drawer and settings of the phone. This is with fully updated apps, OS, stock rom and launcher. This problem exists since January and has not yet been fixed in March.

What happened? The app is glitching a lot. When I click on a product the screen does not show me the title or number of stars. They just disappear. Those are the first two things I always look at. Then when I try to choose an option for the product, it takes forever to load. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app, still same issue. Thought it might be my screen protector so I removed it. Still same issue. Not gonna lie, these issues have resulted in me purchasing less than usual.

New logo looks like a brown bag a wine'o would use, or a barf bag on a plane. It definitely doesn't evoke the quality of Amazon. 08-04-2020 Review Sometimes the improvements make it harder to shop. For instance, when I want to filter my view, the app automatically takes me out of the filter view each time I make a change. The eBay app let's me set all the view filters at one time and gives me a "DONE" button to click when I'm finished. Just my 2¬¢.

I like Prime and use it a lot, but this app drove me nuts! Like others have said, the design is all off. The design team needs to be called in and shown all of these comments. Way too in-your-face bright and carnival-y to be a comfortable shopping experience. Yes, sites have to change over time, but not like this. I'll come back when you've figured it out.

Sorting and filtering is a farce. Default sort by featured is the only sorting method with relevant results. Try sorting by lowest to highest and all relevant results literally disappear. Try comparing sorting methods on an item you know has only enough listings to be on one page and you'll see. So now what? You have to manually browse allll the featured results to find the lowest priced item. Page. By. Page. The longer they have your attention the more likely you are to buy some trash they push

New icon w/ this update is a step down in appealing design. I get it's to look like an Amazon cardboard box, but the ugly brown isn't appealing at all. And I'm frequently getting a blank white screen when I open the app or try to open a product page, not even an error message. And when I type in the "Have a question?" bar then scroll uptdown and try to click on something else, it bounces me right back to the have a question part. I have to back out of product page then go back.

easy to use and has nearly everything you will need. could improve on the way you can refine a search, I find eBay is better at searching when you refine it for specifics. but can't complain about amazon's service. maybe it's because I'm a prime customer which makes a big difference in price, otherwise delivery charges would be high. app is good.

My main annoyance, and it may be small to some but it's happened enough to make me just use Google search instead and use other retailers, is that it will change your search terms when looking for products, thinking they're typing errors I guess, but it leads to completely unrelated results. Pretty poor, I know what I want look for, let me look for it, don't interfere.

I've been actively using Amazon since my Multiple Sclerosis has made everything super limited. They're usually always early, most products I buy are to help me do some kind of normal task, that's just gotten a bit more challenging so im adapting to new processes. Like smart bulbs, and outlets, controlled by voice, and my phone. Xbox, tv, phones, lights, and spikes for my braces so I avoid extra help falling. I love Amazon. Only issue, ever, is the language barrier, that's cost me extra money.

UI issue in recent versions: the top navigation banner is a gray void of empty space. I can still get to search and departments by blindly tapping on parts of that gray void so its just a graphical error, but this isn't acceptable. Reinstalling with cache clearing doesn't help and I have no idea how to properly report this (neither did the customer care reps at first before giving me a general contact email). A major update later and the problem is WORSE (from intermittent to constant). LG V20

I love amazon. That's why it gets 4 stars. I use it daily to purchase things and have been for over 10 years. I can pretty much avoid going anywhere if I want to, because of amazon. However, recently the app will not even open. It continues to crash. I've tried uninstalling updates, restarting my phone... Nothing has worked. Such a bummer because I don't want to have to use chrome to access my account. #bummed #fixitplease

This app is so glitch and the layout needs updating! I used to have Amazon prime and loved it for a time period. Unfortunately, it wasn't worth the money for me personally and I cancelled my subscription. I only order multiple items at once so, I can exceed the amount necessary to receive free shipping. HOWEVER, when I do this, my total defaults to the most expensive shipping option. THEN, when I manually click free shipping the app freezes. EVERY SINGLE TIME!

Something changed recently when I try to look at clothes the page does not load right and it does not give me an option to pick a size but there is something about looking for a recommended size however it does not work when I try to put my info in. The keyboard never comes up. And just in general have been having more issues when loading items once clicked.

so amazon just took another step forward. splitting up payments for what I assume is customers that have been around for a while and have a credit card on file. I priced other streaming devices and really in the end. you can't find one that offers what the fire stick does. All my orders come on time and over the last 3¬Ω years I've only had one issue. TY Amazon for splitting up payments. Every little bit helps. Especially with no fees, interest or hidden charges.

I don't know what I would do without Amazon! It is my go to place to purchase items that I either can't find in stores or don't want to waste time doing so. For the most part their orders come fast, on time, and as advertised. If there is a delay or discrepancy, their customer service support is amazing! This app allows me to access everything I need in one little click. Never had any bugs and it runs much faster than the site. Overall, I can say Amazon at least got this right! lol

It's Amazon. Nuff said. Only suggestion, allow for dark/night mode. Or allow app to adjust to device's mode settings. When it's late in the evening or early morning and my device is on dark/night mode, the white Amazon background is quite jarring, even with device brightness at its lowest. Other apps auto adjust, Amazon's should too. K, thanks Bae. üòò

neat idea, but search function delivers nonsense results that have nothing to do with the search query, looking at a product from a list and then going back takes you to the top of the list, so you just stop browsing anyway. those parts that work, are fine, but there's not enough of those.//Update : app keeps crashing and sending delayed info pop ups, annoying to no end (changing rating from 2 to 1 star). ZERO SUPPORT just like with all Amazon BS.

Hate the format. Messy looking and too many suggestions flooding the screen instead of just a thorough list of what you are looking for. And you cannot remove these "suggestions" from your search results. This is why I love Ebay for vintage items listings. Amazon is great for new stuff, not for vintage stuff.... The format should be simple layout. Not tons of advertisements and unrelated "what other people bought" suggestions. So far, it's just frustrating to look up anything üòí

I think it's pretty good, there's a few issues. For example I wish if I am looking for curtains I could put in parameters at the top in a filter for color, length, how much sunlight is allowed through, etc. It just seems like if I specify a color (say red) on the search , it doesn't really show only red curtains. I've gotten white and purple curtains showing up and even weird things like tshirts:(

great app. the only complaint is they don't automatically check the free shipping option when shipping can be free. also, some updates ago the shipping selection was moved from a separate page to way down on a page... kinda hides the automatic selection for shipping. liked it better when you stepped thru those items on different pages.

After the most recent update, a good chunk of the sections such as "your account" are inaccessible and give the error page (cs11) w/ the dog. Same goes for some products in search results (even sponsored ones). I've already tried: Updating to the latest version of the app, Force stopping the app, or Clearing the app cache. Probably better off not updating.. Or just using your web browser to access amazon instead.

Amazon is unfortunately so easy and convenient to use for many purchases. O.K. "death of the high street", "exploitation" all issues that kinda niggle at my conscience, but then I selfishly think, "it's cheaper", "it's delivered quickly and it's effortless!" Like it or lump it, times will change. Never had any major issues, either with the app or with Amazon.

A lot of good things about this app. 3 annoyances; App opens the ui frame of the legacy bloatware app and freezes so I have to close out anf force quit just to reopen. when I click a link, it will not take me to the item I cannot copy a link to share..too many diff ways to share within different apps. ...i use the 'copy link' feature the most. dont compose an email for me, i may want to quickly share with multiple group chats, emails, sms. navigating/adding item on wishlist sucks

Latest update: Application only seems to work if you are in the United States for some reason. Not a fan of new icon. Had to make many returns because the product was refurbished and the product language used was not in english or was completely missing instructions. Please watch the prices there are multiple vendors for most products. Amazon is a great company and I wish the vendors were as good as Amazon, there are so many unverified vendors

Amazon Prime is amazing. Any issues with a product 24/7 chat available. My daughter many times has gotten the remote for the fire TV ordered a show that I did not approve of and they will help you out. Example she ordered PGA Tour, I hate golf and they refunded the money for it. Free shipping as long as it has the prime ‚úîon the item fast and friendly delivery. if it dosnt arrive when promised they will help with expediting the shipping. Prime has movies for free to stream with no commercials! ü•∞

App needs some work. I have a Motorola G7-Play phone. Pretty good phone - not the highest end, not garbage. Anyway, the Amazon app often freezes up or outright fails during searching or when I try to check my current orders. Also - the "track your order" is totally screwed up. I had an order to be delivered today, and it was. The problem is the app said the driver was 10 stops away but the order (package) was actually delivered, it was here but the app said otherwise. App needs some tweaking.

I really don't like the new UI. It makes it impossible to find anything by wasting so much space you have to scroll forever to see anything, there's a lot of things missing, and it's really awkward too navigate now. The old design wasn't perfect, but it was far better than this mess, and at least I didn't have to constantly scroll to see more than two things at once.

I love shopping on Amazon. In all the years that I have used their services. I have only had to return one item and that was because the item was not what I had ordered. I followed their instructions and the item was returned and I was re-emburshed fairly quickly. On the whole their drivers are efficient and deliver to me on the day and time stated. Most of us, need things from time to time and search different websites for cheaper prices, I can say I'm a proud Amazon shopper and enjoy Prime. üôÇ

Love the app! Easy to use and love Prime! Only four stars and not 5 because the pricing seems to have increased on many of the products. I realize that it is similar to other sellers like eBay or Craigslist, that seems to be the problem. Originally it was surefire products you could rely on direct from the manufacturers at lower prices. Now, not so much. Wish the pricing and products were more dependable as was the past. Still, great üëçthough. Beats fighting in the stores and wearing masks üò∑.

My only issues are trying to cancel subscribed channels. It says to go to membership and subscriptions,manage subscriptions ,Advanced controls . The help section says the manage subscription is beside the channel, the advanced controls in that menu. Advanced controls only shows up in Prime Membership I have two channels I have been trying to cancel now since the trial ended. I was hesitant previous channels we tried to cancel we just cancelled Prime Membership to finally get rid of them.

Horrible experience. Set up credit card for monthly prime payment but the debit card I use for purchases was charged instead. Caused an overdraft they would do nothing about. Then set up for a reminder to cancel before next charge and the app did not remind me. Can sure tell me what AMAZON would like me to buy from them tho! Canceling end of the month and never using this again.

The app has been great and useful, but lately it freezes when free shipping is selected at the checkout. I have updated the app and tried again with no luck. At the moment I can only put things into my basket through the app, try the free shipping option, and then if it doesn't work log in onto the website through my computer to finish the order. This defeats the object of having what was a really convenient app!

Cluttered & clumsy. Hoped it would replicate features of the website (as the view/edit Recommendations function - which I use a lot - has stopped working there), but app is just a massive, ever-scrolling billboard pushing stuff in which I have no interest. Took too long to find where Recommendations was hidden after install and sign-in, and when located were very limited and often irrelevant to past purchases. Uninstalled. Will persevere with .co.uk in the hope that the website will be fixed.

I would consider giving better reviews but maybe it's that time of year for hardships. my package stated delivered but never actually arrived. However, the refund or item replacement process was very convenient and made my experience delightful. it was automated but concise. packages should be handled with better care. I understand things are in demand, but if it were the delivers packages being delivered, you'd want it to be taken cared of as if it were yours. But 4 stars!

New update is HORRIBLE! Blank screen trying to load item info or other pages. Reviews for items are all mixed up. Looking up handheld electric can openers. Both top reviewed are reviews for things nor related to a can opener! Misdeliveries are getting really bad. Not completely Amazon's fault but are UPS and USPS being charged back for screwing up deliveries? Then it takes 2 full days to get a refund or redelivery. I'm Prime. Prime is getting less and less attractive.

Amazon, a company that is all encompassing, dependable, very competitive with service at your fingertips. They offer not only their own brands but other reputable businesses have a chance to showcase their wares. No overselling an item and then you wait months hoping to receive. No issues with their service, always courteous, quick to replace or refund if needed. Deliveries as per order most always intact and on time, it's hard to beat Prime.

Don't buy 1 left items if the are fulfilled by Amazon. What happens is that Amazon doesn't have the product yet when it's already selling it. Then if the item is not "sellable" they don't tell you they just return your money and say you will be notified when it's shippable. Which could be never! For big value hard to find items forget Amazon.

I haven't had any issues until this morning. All of a sudden after a update the app will not open on my android. I have uninstalled a few times and reinstalled to no help. Very irritating for sure Try to find a number is a nightmare I have been transferred 3 time and each time on ignore for several minutes only to have the original tech tell me people at that number do not address this issue. Not impressed at all.

I love the Amazon shopping app! It used to crash a little too often but now I've noticed that since the last couple updates that it runs very smooth. I love having the "buy again" it takes me right to items that someone might purchase every month or so. Having Kindle books or Audible right here makes things so easy and convenient. Go Amazon!

I love this app. I use it literally everyday. I'm giving it a 4 star because for the last couple of days, the app has been crashing. I have to un/reinstall just to gain access. But as soon as I close it, it starts crashing again. This started happening after the change. Please fix.

Great until lately.... The app no longer lets you complete an order. You can shop and add to cart but you can't complete the purchase. The only way to complete a purchase is to do it from a computer which defeats the purpose of having the mobile app. It seems that I am not the only one having this issue based on the other reviews I am seeing. Hope you get this fixed soon.

App keeps crashing. Here's how i fixed it (Android). Go into phone settings, apps, find google chrome, uninstall updates to chrome. Then go to play store settings and turn off auto updates. Restart phone and your apps won't crash. Some people report uninstalling updates to system webview also works. Don't forget to undo all of this once they fix the bug.

What were you thinking Amazon? The latest update looks like something that you would find years ago on the web. I have been a prime member for years now and love the convienence of shopping online with fast shipping. However, I HATE the new app since you have made it so unfriendly to the user, when it even works right that is. If you dont fix this and do it fast, then you are going to lose a lot of business!

Amazon offers a huge variety of products that can be purchased and delivered in a timely fashion. As a prime member, I'm offered early access to a variety of products.. I recently purchased alexa 4th generation hub with super great speaker along with a few echos... I can ask Alexa to add items to my cart and purchase without pushing a button.. Amazon is convenient, accurate, timely and I absolutely love it... no driving to the store waiting in lines etc.. Highly recommend!

Your app has become unusable since the last few updates. Unable to switch between options within a chosen item or have the item update when chosen to add to the checkout. Unable to add to cart when pressing the add button. I've had to use the desktop option to shop. The app is only good to check on the progress of an order at this point.

I usually love Amazon, but since they started advertising a free trial for their prime subscription, it has been extremely difficult at the checkout page to select the free shipping option. It almost looks like it is don't on purpose. also, do not offer a chat option in your customer service, if after explaining everything you'll be told that a call is needed.

The app is not allowing my tablet to receive text messages when I left this comment from my tablet the app developer replied and said to do some updates and that it would be fixed. I've done the updates and nothing has changed. Makes the app very useless. I've been working with Verizon for the past 3 days to try to get the situation rectified and they have not been successful either.

New user interface is horrible! Had to Uninstall multiple times and still doesn't work. Keeps glitching. If someone sends me a link, it opens in my app but keeps glitching and won't let anything happen. Why change something that works!! Also, everything is GIANT now. Words and images!!

When I open and use the app, the top third portion where the logo and search is, the colored portion, turns all gray when I start scrolling and flickers. I have to close the app and open it again to fix it, but it always comes back. It is so annoying. This has been happening for a few months now. No update has yet to fix it...

I have been using Amazon for various things for years. Quite possibly over a decade and I like it. If there were some things I would change it would be, 1) When the delivery options are shown in the checkout section, it would be nice if I could have one button which allows for multiple items to all be delivered on the same day (Prime delivery permitting of course). 2) For Amazon to pay its fair share in taxes. (This is why I gave 4/5 stars)

Usually Amazon is great but this past week the app has crashed numerous of times. Not sure if it was an update, but had to uninstall and reinstall the app at least 5 times along with multiple phone restarts. And my orders that were supposed to come this week are late and haven't gotten anything! I ordered something on the 16th and I PAY for prime. Nothing! If this keeps up I'll be forced to shop elsewhere. 1st world problems! Smh.

I love using Amazon Prime. But Amazon lack a decent Search engine. There are no options to put in " " or + or - to narrow down our searches and make it specific for what we want to search for. For example... If I want to buy 5L IPA, I get shown all litre sizes for single item sellers. I don't want results for sizes I have no interest in. **** Please make a better search feature. You have the money to do it, and it doesn't cost that much to make a small edit.

This app is a mess. I've removed it and reinstalled it twice. It opens up normally, then after awhile all the icons move to the bottom of the page. Orders can't be opened, sometimes shopping cart can't open. Deals jump into the view whether I want to see them or not. You need to fix this mess Amazon!

Generally fast and easy to use but sometimes it does glitch out and lag or be unresponsive. Also sometimes categories are useless and used as just a big ad with a slash image promoting something new, specifically in my case the video game section just being a big ad for the new consoles and not letting you see the list of games unless you actually search out exact titles with almost way to just browse like before.

Though I work for Amazon's competitor, I shop here b/c of its wide range of products. Shipping is EXCELLENT. I absolutely LOVE when I do a search for certain items, I get accurate results or something very similar. Search for MEN'S sneakers, I see a wide range of JUST MEN's sneakers, unlike other sites that shows items that are totally irrelevant. 1 thing I would like Amazon to change is the review process. Reviews are left on items that has ABSOLUTELY NOTHING to do with that ITEM.

I really like shopping on Amazon. it is quick easy and efficient... except for when you're trying to get an order for filled by a seller who ships your package to the other side of the country and the refuses to answer you nor do you get any assistance from Amazon. if it's fulfilled by Amazon then it's pretty easy to get it taken care of if there's a mistake made. so I just be cautious when buying from third party sellers.

What is going on? I have been using this app for over a year, now it keeps crashing over and over, I cant even open it anymore. I have tried to restart my phone, and also re-download the app. But keeps crashing. This is absurd, if they want my money they better get this to work. (Using a samsung note9 android)

Extremely frustrating and useless to me. Every time I open an Amazon link in on my chrome browser, it doesn't redirect me to the app it just sits there and pretends to open something. Then when I manually click on the Amazon app it has a white screen then closes out and says this app has stopped working. I've deleted the app and redownload it twice and tried different accounts. Nothing fixes it.

This app is easy to use, easy to understand and searches are often spot on! Even if you search for the wrong words, they will always suggest you something quite precise to what you're looking for. Amazon in general has an awesome client service, all problems from fraudulent purchases to reimbursements have been dealt with the most professionalism and care. It's trustworthy and easy to use.

Definitely easy to navigate within app... I really prefer online shopping over going to the store anymore, so happy it's something we have as an option as consumers. Another huge reason for this preference is being able to research a product/item before buying by using reviews. I love this! Helps me get an good idea of what to expect/whether I'll like what I'm buying.

A good app to buy things and if you do not like it return it. Their return policy is the best hands down. However, to contact a buyer is PANFUL!!vEbaay's contact sellers system overlaps this one by a mile! It would save so much time than having to return an item. I have no idea why I need to go through Amazon rather than contacting the seller/retailer myself! De to this matter alone they lose a star for me. There is room for improvement. It all depends on. Amazon.

Better than eBay... by far! Scams are harder to run as opposed to eBay. Even after I fell "victim" to just 1 scam with Amazon last year , it was a pillow-fight (unlike eBay's failures in catching & fixing obvious scams) in comparison. Not getting a real/original/copy-written DVD that a listing claimed to be selling & showing --- instead sending a burnt DVD in a case doning an insert that's CLEARLY printed from home on cheap paper is far more concerning once it's clear how long it takes to fix!

After the recent update the top and bottom bars flicker so fast it could cause seizures for sensitive groups. Before and after the update, the app changes what I enter in the search no matter what I've tried, like overactive autocorrect. I can't search for things in my size or for products with a purposefully incorrectly spelled name, like a z instead of an s.

Amazon is my best friend! I rarely have to go into a shopping mall. Talk about convenience, they are #1 hands down in my book both personally and professionally. If there is an issue they are fast to correct it. They even give replacements before you have to send the damaged or faulty products back. My experience with Amazon has been great!

Its an ok app, layouts good etc. Few issues tho- cant zoom in to products while searching, and If you go off the app for longer than a few hours it loses your search and you're back on the homepage which can be really frustrating when you've been clicking through reccomendations to find the right thing. Due to this i dont use it as much as i would and often just go to the website through my internet browser... Its personally not suited but is still a good app and could be useful for others.

Everytime I go to change the shipping option in my cart, the app just spins for several minutes until I give up and close the app and shop somewhere else. Fine with me. You are making it easier for me to NOT buy from you and find other options. I have even restarted my phone and uninstalled and reinstalled the app. This has been going on for weeks. I give up. Not worth the time.

Glitchy. Scrolling right through color options of items and the screen goes blank. Not an internet issue, and the app is up to date. Search options don't work right as well. If you set your search to less than $25 you still get more expensive options...and not just their "suggested" options

I love amazon but for the past few days whenever I try to open the app it will go to a white page and then will close. Whatever issues are going on with the app I hope it gets fixed soon.

I mean who doesn't love Amazon. I think it's become apart of everyone's life. If you have never ordered from Amazon, then you must live under a rock. haha This Amazon shopping app just makes shopping with Amazon that much quicker and easier. Get your account info, payment info, purchase history and so much more all in one place. I've been using this Amazon shopping app for a long time and I've never experienced any problems of any kind with it. If you're not using this app, then you should.

I think I've had 100's of orders and even though a few of them didn't go perfectly, I was always taken care of by customer service people that seem to have only one goal. Also seems like the ones that can think, are allowed to. very easy to do business with and they make returns just as easy. I find that 9x out of 10 their price is better than other's but even if not, the price is close enough that I'll still order from them to avoid any potential inconvenience in case something isn't right.

App is easy to navigate, although could do with better options to find key information as some products/ sellers set their listing out differently. Amazon is very useful to get your deliveries with lots of different options. Pay your fair share of taxes and I'd rate higher!

It's not bad, for a rich company could be more. Can't shop w/a migraine, *PLS* make Dark Mode, not invert. It'd be cool to search in all lists vs. 1 list. Wish you could leave comments. You could make it short + block a lot of words, or maybe auto responses like, "Thank you", "I agree", "My experience was different", "I contacted & no one helped", "I contacted support & got help", "I was contacted wks later", "I was contacted mo later" for quick overview. I like thanking ppl, encourage reviews.

Love the app makes things really easy The only difficulty I've had is looking up past orders. You are able to look beyond the 3 months and have a broader search option on the actual web page. But you're always sacrificing something if you're switching to an app

Amazon is by far my favorite online shopping site. All the perks that come with a Prime membership make it well worth the subscription price of $12.99 a month. Occasionally you'll run into little issues, and Amazon usually always does everything they can to make it right. I'm a loyal, happy customer through and through. I'd give 10 stars if I could!

Every since the app was updated. It refreshes so fast and kicks me out of whatever I'm doing and goes back to the home screen. So aggravating. Amazon, Stop messing with your app. Frustrating when the UI keeps changing. Sometimes the option appears in hamburger menu, other times you have to look around randomly for the option you want. App has been very glitchy in the past few days everytime I open it the app shows a white screen and then exits out to my phones home screen but is still open in the recents used apps that app is not failing with an error but there's something wrong with the app. Help fix this amazon and I'll change the review to 5 stars as I do love everything amazon stands for. Such a horrible app to operate. Bad interface and the app looks like it was made by a 10 year old. It also doesn't show all click and collect locations, and doesn't show all search results either. I always have to use the website to see all results, so it is pretty pointless having this app.

I love amazon I really do I use it all the time but since this new update its been glitchy, does what it wants and now it will not open. I'd been using this app for years just fine but around the time they updated the logo, it quit working for me, it quits loading when I attempt to change the shipping. I used this forever. Some reason this update doesn't work when you go to check out. like amazon the fact that they reduce prime price if you receive benefits. Enjoy the options, free shipping&deals. i can find many things i need on a regular basis that end up being cheaper in the end than if id buy it any where else even at walmart or bulk stores. only thing i dislike is that they wait to take the payment out until it ships that can interfere with any auto payments you have come out or sometimes result in overdraw charges so you have to be extra diligent or pay alot more

Love it. Has EVERYTHING you could possibly think of. Shipping is quick and tracked. Easy to use. Reliable! Love Prime, kindle and audible. Not so crazy about the new icon. It's ugly fellas. And the help on chat and phone is friendly and, unlike some businesses, is actually helpful. They go out of their way to help.

If you shop online,this app is a must have.. brand name products, free two day shipping, and Prime video with prime membership for less than $10 a month, it's like getting Netflix and free shipping on all your products and you'll make that back on shipping alone, competitive pricing, It's no wonder Amazon is no.1, believe me, I don't buy anything without check with them first before shopping elsewhere. A must have!!!!!

Amazon is great for shopping a variety of things without having to drive 45 minutes to the closest shopping mall. With Prime I can get most things the next day on items I want right away. The return policy is great if something I've ordered is not as I expected it to be. Plus Prime has better shows and movies than I've been finding on Netflix.

Archaic app and now a garbage bag app icon! The navigation through the app is at least a decade old relic. Search is basic to the point you can hardly narrow down without going through hoops. I love amazon. The only thing I don't like so much about it is that sometimes it's hard to find what you are searching for because it has several items listed that are not even close to what you are searching for. I also love being a prime member with all of it's benefits, especially the movies!

Idk what happened but everytime I try to search something, the view is jumbo sized and I can hardly see anything. Its not worth the hassle trying to order stuff now if I can barely see it. Easy to use, with no major bugs (at least not any that have affected me so far), and very versatile (you have shopping / wishlists, different languages, shipping options and payment methods). Shipping is tracked directly in the App, with live view, and the overall prices, shipping speed and customer support have been excellent so far.

Latest update not working, click on the product everything above the picture disappears. To see the pictures on reviews is a struggle. I wish I could go back to the previous version. And despite de glitches, I never liked the search filters, you search by a certain brand and the results are totally not the brand I want to see.

App is super buggy!! I never never used to have this problem, but since the most recent update the app will completely freeze up and go blank on me, whenever I try to go back.... I pay a whole lot of money for my packages to NEVER arrive on time. The lies on this app! I love shopping on Amazon. I often use it to compare prices if another sites shipping time is not acceptable for a similar product. If my local stores are out of stock for a product I need, I know I can find it on Amazon. I have had all of my issues with deliveries and returns solved effectively and efficiently by their customer service.

This app is terrible, just stick to the main site. This app added random things to my basket on occasion and because I though I had been hacked I changed my passwords. On doing so it meant I lost all my playlists on my amazon music, and also had to re-sign in to all my amazon devices and fire sticks. All because this app made me think I had been hacked when actually it was the app moving things in my basket that had been 'saved for later' for months ago, back into the basket. Naff!

Amazon already knows its the best. Do I really need to post it? Almost anything I want can be found on Amazon. The prices are super competitive and, sometimes, incomparable. The delivery is super, super fast! And their service is so outstanding, only the rich get better, maybe. So they're you go. Amazon is the best!

App spontaneously sends a pop-up to my phone's email and it cannot be stopped. The pop-up in LARGE, intrusive and I get one for every single package, every single time I check email on my phone. Hours spent with Amazon techs and it cannot be stopped. Ridiculous; won't be ordering from Amazon nearly as much anymore.

honestly the app keeps changing in bad ways. search functions are basically useless. every time a parameter is changed it goes back to results instead of staying and letting us further refine the search. as it is now I have to open the filter menu like 6 times whenever I search for something. fail.

Updated app is unfriendly layout and slow and feels more like I'm on a webpages with slow refresh than an app. Awkward now for fingers to navigate most used pages. Use to take seconds to pop on and check orders. As a developer my advice is, if it ain't broke don't fix it. This update is a step backwards.

Great app! Convenient, the pictures and descriptions are clear. It is trustworthy and fast so it's the 1st place I shop. Just want to report that there is a glitch when trying to upload a photo or video in the reviews section. The banner shakes and I cannot tap the boxes that allow access to my photos so that I can Upload one for my review.

Amazon used to be great but it's definitely lost it's touch. I started an account so my husband buys me a $500 Amazon gift card to add to the account balance & it goes through just fine so I place orders then I get an email saying my account is on hold for unusual activities. I follow the instructions for unlocking my account by sending a picture of the receipts for the gift card & it still hasn't been resolved. Even if the orders ever get sent, it'll be the last time I purchase from Amazon.

It's so buggy. I change the shipping options and it loads for forever. All the animations slow down the app, and if you see a product on the home page, good luck finding it if you click on it; its just a misleading thumbnail for a category. Advertisements *inbetween* listings of items I'm trying to peruse to buy. Really? Im already buying on your app. Why advertise to me? Oh and also, why do some of the side scrollers not allow me to continue scrolling downward?

it's OK but I've been silenced on being able to review. They think I'm getting paid but I am not and the items I purchase are for my personal use. I think they are upset that I contacted the actual seller with issues I was having with their product. All Amazon did was send a new item that was defective.

What happened to the app, the latest version seems like it's gone backwards. The menu text is huge and jarring against the text while browsing results, the menu buttons have unnecessarily been moved - not sure where these needs came from but they've made this app really hard to use

Very good and I use it a lot. The only annoying thing about it is that I seem to find a good offer on something browsing on a pc when I'm not at home but then when I use the app to look for the same offer to buy it,it usually takes a lot if searching to find it. It doesn't always show the best price first. That said it's very convenient and I'll continue to use it.

It's okay, they have some variation of everything, unfortunately the shipping times for me on a lot of orders isn't as promised. I'm getting closer and closer to canceling Prime. I could save money by paying the regular shipping fee and waiting a couple days at this point since prime delivery is getting close to a regular delivery time frame. The sad part is, I live in a city with two Amazon warehouses and I live near an Amazon data center.

I cant stand this new layout of the app. Its done well to break my shopping habit. I uses to be able to scroll through search results, now there are only a few before I have to redundantly move onto one page to the next. On top of it, half the results aren't related.

A great way to save time and money, and avoid big crowds specially during this pandemic, however going to the store to touch and seeing the merchandise before buying can never be replaced. It's a feeling of its own, since it gives you that certainly of buying what you actually want while comparing right there and then with other competitors. This is my opinion of course, so just shop away!

I always find value and quality. They were very honest and i was happy when I forgot to cancel but never used prime for 8 months and quick return of unintended payments. Only hickup is it takes a while to take funds from my acct and the orders are grouped together. I found out its better to just put money into the amazon payment system.

"Default payment method" should not be turned on by default. It is a huge inconvenience that a random card on my profile was charged whenn the first payment method didn't process. The worst part is, it won't let me change it and I'll have to cancel my order and re-place it. Will be deleting my cards because this isn't the first time Amazon used them unpermitted. Disingenuous.

great shopping site. quick and easy to find what you are looking for. new feature I've noticed is buying used items on what you're searching for. New update is TERRIBLE!! Can't manage my wedding registry which is something I really do need to do because all the sudden 10 things are now out of stock all at the same time. Since I can't give lower then one star, then one star it is. Tried placing an order the other day and it was impossible. Every time I pressed the free shipping the whole thing freezes. The app is probably one of the best shopping apps that you can find but of course that comes from years of experience and being the number one online shopping choice for the entire world. I almost want to take away one star because the new app icon is terrible

I absolutely love shopping through Amazon! There are a couple of things recently that I would like to see different: They started using USPS to ship packages with a lot. I would like to see them go back to shipping with Amazon. Also, go back to seeing the GPS of the drivers.

I use this Amazon almost every day. They have made my life possible. I'm terminally ill and haven't been able to safely shop since this pandemic. I'm grateful for the fast, and free delivery I get with my Prime membership. I use the app and appreciate the status updates by text I get letting me know of my delivery, including a picture of where it's been placed. The driver's are always courteous. I have never had a problem with any returns or customer service. I'm a satisfied customer of Amazon.

I love the Amazon app, and make multiple purchases from the app. But since the last update, it started glitching out and now I cant even use the app on my phone anymore. This is both infuriating and frustrating all at once. My husband and I have orders that were in our cart that now we cant access because the app wont work now. Come on Amazon.... Fix this....

All good except the new layout, the layout now has all the useful tabs at the bottom and I honestly don't like it. The layout is clunky now and not streamlined like it used to be. I wish apps didn't change things like the layout when they're working fine. It's so frustrating to have to fully relearn where everything is.

Good enough. The new icon is gross, it's mainly brown and just looks dirty. You can check order status and buy stuff easily with the app, if you add things to cart it will show of you go on desk top. Iove this app and how easy it is to use. I also enjoy being able to start and complete a return all through the app. no long lines to wait in, the seller or Amazon gets right back to you via email with any questions you have and if need be print your return label right from home. It's a great app all the way around. Thanks Amazon!

I love the app but the new app icon picture is really creepy. The app begins with an "A" so the first thing you open up to when you go to browse all the apps on your phone is an eyeless, brown, coy looking smile. I'm not a fan of that. I know you're going for a little package but it was an unpleasant first impression. I would prefer it to be switched back or to see a new design.

Its perfect for personal shopping and for my business with fast delivery and regularly updated delivery times. I can often find what I need through Amazon from the same supplier, but with the comfort of Amazon purchasing/reliability and safety. I also am currently impressed with the Amazon Wardrobe service being provided just now, making cloth shopping almost as convenient as it used to be before lockdown.

Terrible! If you like to use the desktop version of the site through chrome etc and you have this installed, it tries to use this useless app all the time. It has an awful layout, buggy, constantly annoying when your browsing. I use Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ 5G, this is a terrible tool. Also, you can't contact customer services without this app, so you have to keep installing it then uninstall after your call with them. Total pain by Amazon and has stopped me buying so much from amazon.co.uk.

Wide variety of whatever you're looking for. Better know your prices before ordering. Not always the cheapest. Have only had good success with Amazon warranties. Shipping is usually fast and reliable. Final word, definitely a viable shopping option. Site is easy to navigate.

I gave 4 stars, because sometimes the things purchased are not as good a quality as expected. If you have the patience with the search filters then you can find what you are looking for. Also the customer reviews should be an indication if the item is worth your time and money. I have received many great purchases from Amazon and that is why I give it 4 stars.

I've been ordering on and off from Amazon for twenty plus years. Except for that first time that I didn't receive what I wanted, I haven't been disappointed by the service. Delivery has been faster and earlier than I expected. My only beef is saving to my wish list because sometimes the Add to Wish List button doesn't work and it shuts down the app. Overall, four and a half out of five stars. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Use to love Amazon shopping, but since the update it seem everytime I click on the app to open it, it kicks me right back off. I could honestly spend hours here just "screen shopping." I suppose it's relaxing and exciting at the same time, especially when you stumble across something really neat! Easily one of my most used apps every month and one of my most vital. I always need something! And even if I don't, I have friends or family members that do! Either way the customer service is exceptional and the sheer magnitude of the store is second to none! Lastly, I have no issue with the app that's worth mentioning. Bravo!

I've placed lots of orders over the past few years, especially in the last 12 months, which has been a lifeline during the closure of many shops. It's become really difficult to find quality items .You can't trust if items are genuine and they have blurred the lines as much as possible between who's actually selling what. I wish I knew about Amazon allot sooner then I did because of all the great services they offer. I used wish all the time until now Amazon is my go to for shopping online. Used to be awesome. Recent update changed it. It constantly flashes and stops working. I have uninstalled three times. My husband is having the same issue. I have spent so much with Amazon Prime. I really hope this is fixed soon so we can get back to the five star experience.

great app to use easy and well though out. prime delivery is a must and Amazon's customer service is second to non. unfortunately Amazons search engine needs bringing up to date though and pales in comparison to eBay's often similarly named items are returned in search results and allot of the sort by category's don't order the lists correctly like price low to high. overall it's just sloppy.

Amazon has done remarkably well at connecting us to a huge number of products and services. Customer response team has great sense of urgency. App is incredibly user friendly and very optimized. great way to find stuff you need or want without hassles of going to multiple stores searching. love the compare to similar items option as well makes it very easy to see the difference in price and what the product is. fast shipping usually. prime benefits are great too definitely worth it.

Everything U want or need at Walmart prices or less. Can purchase in bulk, with Prime deliveries are free. They have items you can't find anywhere else. Love return policy. Excellent in every way. Amazon is Pandemic Perfect! The ease of returning makes it the safest and most economical way for me to shop. Amazon's 2 day shipping policy is great and extremely reliable. As far as I'm concerned, Amazon app is essential for to all aspects of your daily living. Amazon, don't leave home without it. It's everything at your fingertips. Sometimes on the same day or within hours. They've sought every problem I had and compensated for mistakes made.

userName: Tinna Wilson of N2 The Afterlife
content: I love Amazon! It's very user friendly, and very easy to work. The deliveries could be faster on some things. Over all I have has nothing but great service in the last 5 years! I highly recommend people use Amazon.

Like most people, I love Amazon. Being an Amazon Prime member is worth it. Faster shipping, cheaper prices in some instances. You can definitely find just about anything on the website. Be sure you check the size charts on clothing, not everything comes from your country. Checkout is quick and wonderful.

I always enjoy shopping at Amazon, except for one time that I bought an electronic blanket for my sister as a gift, Amazon made a mistake and shipped a construction tool to her! A surprise turned to a trouble, my sister needed to drop off the wrong item to me for return, and I had to reorder the blanket and ship to myself first, because I didn't want to cause anymore trouble to the gift receiver....

searching on this app is terrible, many times the top results are product that are ether counterfeit or false advertising. it takes a long time to check to make sure that the product and seller is legit. one mayor problem is that items labelled as prime are also priced higher by about $10 than normal on other sites which gives the impression that 2day shipping is not actually covered by prime membership you really just end up paying more for faster shipping

amazon is the best place to find so much in one place. but be careful what you order. there are so many knock off items on there. How to Fix Recent Crash Issue (3/23/21): ANDROID has the issue not Amazon (or Gmail which has the same issue). You have to update 2 apps - Android System Webview and Google Chrome. If you need instructions, there are 2 methods: 1) In the Play Store, click the upper left corner icon and press "my apps." There will be a list of apps that need updating, and you should be able to find those 2. 2) Search for the apps, and click "update" where it would normally say "open."
